flavor_text.diamond_pearl: With a scary face, the user forces a kiss on the foe. It may make the target fall asleep.
flavor_text.platinum: With a scary face, the user forces a kiss on the foe. It may make the target fall asleep.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the foe. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.
